overview: There’s nothing but trouble in this house and there’s bound to be even more when girls like Amirah Adara, Nelly Kent, Silvia Dellai, Lina Mercury and Olivia Sin find their way in! JJ has just received an inheritance… but can he keep it? The maintenance man sure comes at a high cost fucking his unfaithful wife at the first visit, but everything has a solution, rent it! These girls definitely know how to get the most out of a mansion. Curious neighbours, maids on duty, two mysterious policemen… what will happen? Find out in Private Gold, Fuck & Breakfast!
title: Fuck & Breakfast
